cn.title: 关于比特派服务器常规升级的通知

message.data: 为提高服务器性能，更好的服务用户，比特派服务器将于香港时间2020年5月7日凌晨 00:00 进行常规升级，预计3小时。升级期间将暂停软件内收发币等全部功能，请您提前做好相关规划，升级完成后会第一时间恢复相关服务，感谢您的理解与支持。
比特派为去中心化钱包，服务器的主要作用是为用户同步常见区块数据，因此服务器的升级并不会影响用户资产安全性。

en.title: Notification on Regular Upgrade of Server

message.data: For better server performance and client service, Bitpie will have a regular upgrade of the server at 00:00 May 7, 2020 (HongKong Time). The duration will be about 3 hours. During this period, all receiving, sending will be suspended. We will resume all the services as soon as we complete the upgrade.
Thank you for your understanding and support.
Tip: Bitpie is a decentralized wallet. The main function of the server is to synchronize the common block data for users. Hence the server upgrade has nothing to do with the users’ asset safety.
